description: Simple, fast, and healthy breakfast toast recipes that aren't boring and will keep you satisfied throughout the morning!
keywords: apple cinnamon toast, avocado and bean toast, peanut butter, banana, and chocolate toast
name: SIMPLE HEALTHY VEGAN BREAKFAST TOAST THAT ISN’T BORING
recipeIngredient: 1 piece of toasted whole grain bread
2 tablespoons of peanut butter (You can use any nut butter)
1/2 of an apple – thinly sliced with the skin on
2 to 3 tablespoons of warm vegan refried beans
A drizzle of sriracha or salsa
1 tablespoon of mini chocolate chips (I use Enjoy Life brand)

recipeInstructions.text: Toast the bread, spread the peanut butter on the toast, fan the sliced apples over the top of the peanut butter and press in a bit so they stick, sprinkle the cinnamon over the top. Enjoy!
